goal.en: This course is designed to develop students‘ knowledge of ERP architecture and functionality. After completing the course, students should understand the architecture and design concepts of ERP systems and be able to maintain the daily operations of ERP systems (especially SAP/R3). This knowledge should provide students with a solid foundation for learning other mods and future interactions with technical staff. To help students become familiar with ERP systems, the course will include many practical homework exercises. ERP knowledge is complex and expensive. While the rewards can be huge, so is the effort required. If you decide to take this course, spend a good amount of time on your computer before you get it ready, otherwise, you‘re just wasting resources. To help students become familiar with ERP and SAP S/4Hana systems, the course will include many practical exercises. ERP knowledge is complex and expensive. While the rewards can be huge, so is the effort required. Students taking this course are recommended to spend considerable time in front of a computer to become familiar with the system. Course content includes: 1. Introduction to SAP S/4HANA system architecture and basic technology 2.SAP system management 3. Introduction to SAP Fiori 4. Introduction to Hana
goal.ch: 本課程旨在培養學生基本的 ERP 架構和功能知識。完成課程後，學生應了解 ERP 系統的架構和設計理念，並能夠維護 ERP 系統（特別是 SAP/R3）的日常運作。這些知識應該為學生學習其他模組以及將來與技術人員進行交流提供堅實的基礎。為了幫助學生熟悉 ERP 系統，課程將包括許多實作練習。 ERP知識既複雜又昂貴。雖然回報可能是巨大的，但所需的努力也是巨大的。如果您決定參加本課程，請準備好在電腦前花費大量時間，否則，您只是在浪費資源。 為了幫助學生熟悉 ERP 和 SAP S/4Hana 系統，課程將包括許多實作練習。 ERP知識既複雜又昂貴。儘管回報可能是巨大的，但所需的努力也是巨大的。建議參加本課程的學生花大量時間在電腦前熟悉系統。 課程內容包括： 1. SAP S/4HANA系統架構及基礎技術介紹 2.SAP系統管理 3. SAP Fiori簡介 4. Hana簡介
